fields.description: This is the unique ID for Miscellaneous Payment Request. This is System generated ID. Any input to this ID will be ignored automatically.

If this is blank, Workday will assume a value of 1. If invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount.

This is the Unit Price. If this is blank, Workday will default the unit price from the item if one is configured.  If invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount.
If the invoice line has a quantity and unit price, then Workday will automatically calculate extended amount.

Reference to existing worktags. Worktags are a way to mark tasks and business objects to make them easier to access and summarize.  Each transaction can include one value for each worktag type and is subject to configurable validation when submitted for approval.
